description:
Cold and very aquatic river canyon. Only possible when the waterlevel of the Kamniška Bistrica gauge at Kamnik is below 3 m³/sec.

Approach

From the parking place follow the marked path to the bridge over the canyon and reach the river above the canyon a bit further upriver.

Descent

After some low but violent slides you reach the only waterfall in the canyon. There are bolts on the left which let you traverse to a small alcove above the waterfall from where you can jump 4m over the turbulent and dangerous pool. Downclimb or jump the rest of the small obstacles in the canyon and watch out for logs and turbulent pools.

Exit

After the canyon opens up leave the canyon to the right.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=epdgEekc8rw

Background
name: Predoselj
